ハイセプターは、魔道剣による攻撃と
魔印を付与することで敵から魔力を奪い、
多彩な魔法へと転換しながら戦う
剣と魔法の使い手です

＜基本操作＞
　【<KC ATTACK1>】 四連斬（剣による連続攻撃）
　【<KC ATTACK2>】 ルイン・ショット（魔法弾）
new:
High Scepter is a wielder of the Magick Sword, using it to launch consecutive attacks and imbue enemies with magical seals, stealing their magic power and converting it into various forms of magic. 
They are skilled users of both sword and magic.

<Basic Controls>
- <KC ATTACK1>[Quadruple Slash]: Consecutive slashes with the sword.
- <KC ATTACK2>[Ruin Shot]: Magic bullets.

<COL ffdc78>ウィル・マーカー</COL>は１体の敵に
魔印を付与することができます

　【<KC WEAPON_SUB>+<KC MARK_SHOT>】 ウィル・マーカー
　　　　　　　　（魔力を吸収する魔印を付与する）

<COL ffdc78>魔印を付与した敵を魔道剣で攻撃すると
魔印が成長し、魔力の吸収量が増加します</COL>

また、魔印が最大まで成長すると一部のスキル性能が
上がるなどの恩恵もあります
new:
<COL ffdc78>Will Marker</COL> can apply a curse to one enemy.

【<KC WEAPON_SUB>+<KC MARK_SHOT>】 Will Marker
(Apply a curse that absorbs magical power)

<COL ffdc78>Attacking an enemy with a cursed mark using a Magick Sword will cause the curse to grow, increasing the amount of magical power absorbed.</COL>

Additionally, when the curse reaches its maximum growth, there are also benefits such as an increase in certain skill performance.

new:
However, if the curse mark is not continuously used for attack, it will gradually weaken, and the amount of magic absorption will also decrease.
Additionally, when you are damaged and the posture is disrupted, it is more prone to weakening.

When defeating an enemy with the curse mark applied, you can obtain a lot of magic power and there are also other benefits, so let's actively target enemies with the curse mark while avoiding their attacks.
